attributes.title: Innapropriate Content
attributes.review: when i first put my information in and opened the app, i was met with a disgusting photo of a naked cheeto😞all of his stuff was hanging out and it gave me a panic attack. it took me forever to stop heaving and catch my breath. that’s not even the worst part, looking through more photos there was an image of a child. the fat cheeto man was grabbing the child’s waist tightly to a point where she seemed uncomfortable. though not illegal, this was EXTREMELY inappropriate. an app like this should be on the app store.

attributes.title: i’m sorry, but no
attributes.review: i downloaded this app cause a friend recommended it to me and i was curious and never thought in my entire life i would see the president would have an app dedicated to him. firstly, i open the app to see them asking for my phone number and then seeing if i would like to receive phone calls and text messages,,, uhm... no. secondly the app is just poorly designed and can use a lot of work everywhere. For example: voting trump out of office in november

attributes.title: gave me covid
attributes.review: i wanted to support our president trump but as soon a i download that app i noticed trump wasn’t wearing a mask where he went and i want to follow the footsteps of our orange and stoped wear a mask in fact i even burned all of my mask then as i went to the store my lovely MAGA hat and all lives matter shirt i was greeted but a liberal and said i had to wear a mask those snowflakes make me so mad😡 i yelled my way through without a mask 2 weeks later i had covid now i’m 6 feet under NEVER making that mistake again.

attributes.title: i can’t with this app
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app there was a clown staring back at me. And the more I looked at it it was swimming in a cage full of camel sh¡t that kept on pouring out then all that was left was a fat baby covered in camel sh¡t. It started turning orange and running in circles around the cage. It then took a lemur and rode on it. I am very confused and displeased with the message the app shares. I showed my mom and I saw the discomfort in her eyes. Then she fainted. Please remove not only this app but remove the person it stands for out of office.😻🤡✨

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD ❤️
attributes.review: Everyone👈👈👈👈 leave a ONE STAR 😼 review!!! This app is HORRIBLE there was a picture of an orange 🍊 when I opened it up 🤪 and it was torture to my eyes 😭 I had to BLEACH 🎀 my eyes 👁👄👁 AND get glasses 🤓 now everyone is calling me a nerd 😤 AND bullying me 😛 because of THIS APP! Do not download ❌🆘❌ It is LITERAL torture!!! Also if you are a trump supporter, this HURTS trumps campaign if you download it but HELPS it when you write ✏️ a ONE STAR ⭐️ review! Donald J Trumpet 🎺 said it HIMSELF 😸 So please help our president ❤️ by leaving a one star review it’s the best you can do 🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷 DO NOT DOWNLOAD! 😻.

attributes.title: This app is bad
attributes.review: This app is so bad it took so many weeks to download and when it did it took up so much storage I had trouble using the app it made my phone stop working and even deleted a lot of my apps when it did download the was really confusing I tried to use my phone and open other apps but it kept taking me back to this app when I didn’t want to. This app has no purpose of being on here if all it is going to do is break my phone

attributes.title: Do not recommend
attributes.review: This app has had many glitches causing my phone to over heat. I had to try downloading it two times for it to full upload. Then once I finally got on it, it kept kicking me out saying there was a failure with my WiFi connection. Which was false because I went on other apps checking if my WiFi was strong and yes I did have all bars. Ridiculous app I do not recommend this to anyone unless your searching for a headache.

attributes.title: App deleted to slowly for me
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for 2 seconds because my friend thought it was a joke so I wanted to see too and after I downloaded this app it was on my home screen in like 2 seconds it really downloads quickly like flash fast but takes forever to delete like it was slowing down and I don’t think that’s how it works I can delete an app it 2.5 seconds so why did this take so long I feel like something is up with a this app 😡

attributes.title: absolutely horrible and HORRIFYING.
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded up i got bugs all over my house. Oh god. It was HORRIBLE. I even have a rat infestation in my house. All because of that up that cheeto made. 💀🤚🏼like hell no. This is such a disgrace to me and MY RAT INFESTATION! 👁👄👁Yall do not know the pain i went through THE PAIN!! It was disgusting. It was getting better untill... A FRICKEN RAT CAME INTO THE HOUSE WITH A FACE OF CHEETO! I QUICKLY TOOK ACTION AND JUMPED FOR MY SUPER- CHANKLA FROM THE DOLLAR TREE! AND THREW IT. IT LANDED ON THE RAT AND SQUISHED IT! THE BLOOD WENT ALL OVER AND THE GUTS! I HAD TO CLEAN FOR 2 FRICKEN WEEKS! 😿AND I DOE IT AGAIN 😗✌🏼. so this is the reason why it deserves 1 star!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: Now this is the worst app I have ever seen I hate this app so much it’s boring and should be taken down from here he’s not even doing anything about black life matter of about Vanessa who got killed she deserves her justice and guess what he’s not doing anything about it or even cares this app should have never been on her I say take it down this app is the worst app I have ever seen and especially since it’s for are presented who doesn’t care on whatever is happening in the world 🍊🍊🍊
